metadata.title: CVE-2024-47542 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: GStreamer is a library for constructing graphs of media-handlingcomponents. A null pointer dereference has been discovered in theid3v2_read_synch_uint function, located in id3v2.c. Ifid3v2_read_synch_uint is called with a null work->hdr.frame_data, thepointer guint8 *data is accessed without validation, resulting in a nullpointer dereference. This vulnerability can result in a Denial of Service(DoS) by triggering a segmentation fault (SEGV). This vulnerability isfixed in 1.24.10.

criterions.comment: gst-plugins-base1.0 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
